control.name: Implement data sanity and data integrity checks
control.desc: Implement data sanity and data integrity checks. Data sanity checks are run on a regular basis to validate the sanity of the data (e.g. through statistical analysis). Data integrity checks are performed when data is entered or changed to ensure the data complies to business validation rules as well as common sense rules (e.g. age should not be over 130 years)

test.steps: Test if users are able to submit malformed, invalid, untrusted, unauthorized data leveraging an intercepting proxy. Especially consider the issue of bypassing non-editable controls such as hidden-fields
